main event: A pilot spotted a blue and white, flashing object moving up and down in the sky southeast of New Orleans in 1954.
interesting points: The object disappeared in the northeast direction.
The pilot believed the object was a star.
The sighting lasted for 3 to 5 minutes.
There were no photographs taken of the object.
The report concluded that the sighting was of an astronomical object, likely a star.
sighted object: a blue and white, flashing object
